Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 127th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, I-94, & 130th due to street blockage near 127th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, and 130th, due to street blockage near 127th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to a sick customer on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to a sick customer on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
